description: This vegetable noodle stir-fry recipe features spiralised veggies tossed in a sweet yet spicy sauce topped with a fried egg, making for an easy yet satisfying vegetarian meal.
keywords: Vegetable Noodle Stir Fry with Fried Egg
name: Vegetable Noodle Stir Fry with Fried Egg Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the noodle mix between 4 bowls, top each with a fried egg, spring onion and a drizzle of sriracha sauce.
